scripts.build:js: browserify app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] mithril-objectify] --debug | uglifyjs > app.min.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] mithril-objectify] -dv --debug -o app.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.dev: npm run serve & npm run watch
